EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Event_Sydney Open House_Q417.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation of Registration : Pivotal Sydney Open House​ on 31 Oct 2017
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Pivotal Sydney Open House. We are delighted to confirm your registration for this exclusive executive event.
Event Details:
Date: Tuesday, October 31, 2017 {{my.Sydney Grand Opening:default=edit me}}
Time:
9:00AM to 2:00PM
Location: Pivotal Sydney 155 Clarence Street, Level 11 Sydney, NSW 2000 (map <[[Pivotal Sydney, 155 Clarence Street, Level 11, Sydney, NSW 2000]]>)
We look forward to seeing you there.
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email marketing-sydney@pivotal.io <[[mailto:marketing-sydney@pivotal.io]]> or visit our website <[[https://pivotal.io/events?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=apj-event-sydney-grand-opening-q417]]>.
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
